Package org.jtrim.image.transform

Contains various image transformations, mostly to support AsyncImageDisplay.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImagePointTransformer
    Defines an interface for transforming 2D points (two dimensional vectors) from one coordinate system to another.
    ImageTransformer
    Defines an image transformation from ImageTransformerData to TransformedImage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffineImagePointTransformer
    Defines a coordinate transformation of 2D points (two dimensional vectors) where the coordinate transformation can be described by an affine transformation.
    AffineImageTransformer
    Defines an ImageTransformer transforming an image based on an affine transformation.
    BasicImageTransformations
    Defines a subset of commonly used 2D affine transformations.
    BasicImageTransformations.Builder
    This class is to be used to create BasicImageTransformations instances.
    ImageTransformerData
    Defines the input of an image transformer.
    ImageTransformerLink
    Defines an AsyncDataLink which transforms an image on the specified TaskExecutorService.
    ImageTransformerQuery
    Defines an AsyncDataQuery which transforms its input image on the specified TaskExecutorService.
    SerialImagePointTransformer
    Defines a coordinate transformation based on a list of other coordinate transformations.
    TransformedImage
    Defines the output of an image transformer.
    TransformedImageData
    Defines the output of an ImageTransformerLink.
    ZoomToFitTransformer
    Defines an ImageTransformer scaling an image to fit the display.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InterpolationType
    Defines types of interpolation to be used when scaling an image.
    ZoomToFitOption
    Defines the possible rules which should be applied when scaling an image to fit a particular display.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImageProcessingException
    Thrown when an image cannot be transformed due to some reason.

Package org.jtrim.image.transform Description

Contains various image transformations, mostly to support AsyncImageDisplay.
